About MathPro Tuition

Founded in 2016, we've helped over 500 students achieve their best in PSLE Math through dedicated teaching and proven methods.

Our Story

MathPro Tuition was founded by Mr. David Chen, a former MOE teacher who noticed that many struggling students just needed the right approach and smaller class sizes to thrive.

After 5 years of teaching in schools, David started MathPro with a simple mission: give every P6 student the personalized attention they deserve to excel in PSLE Math.

What started as a small tutoring centre in Bishan has grown into a trusted name in primary Math education, with a team of dedicated teachers who share the same passion for student success.
